website_summaries.verdict: Fun patterns, amazingly soft, and a two-pack to boot!
pros: Quality material is soft and thicker than other brands
cons: May have a slight petroleum smell at first, but it fades with time and washing

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy!!! BUT my cat who has declawed front paws had jumped in, and by simply jumping out tore the sheet... Kind of disappointed in the durability (our bed sheets have never had an issue with their rear claws), but our baby loves the softness of them! Overall, would recommend, but try to keep cars out ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ali-Marie Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets
customer_reviews.text: Material is a nice jersey cotton, fits great and the design is very nice also. Just the color is little different that it seems on the pictures, was expecting it being more grayish to be honest and it's more brownish, something between grey and brown so it doesn't match completely with our other bedding stuff as I expected but overall it's ok. Will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Martina S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing hold on to mattress perfectly, only thing I wish the material was softer. Over all amazing buy.
customer_reviews.author: Evangelina Aquino Batista

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff !
customer_reviews.text: This are very nice sheets ! Soft material, fits perfectly and goes with our airplane interior. It's useful to have couple or few of them to switch them when it gets dirty. Our child spits milk and sometimes we forget to put burpie under or it's spills over on a sheet anyway. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenia Dietman

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets
customer_reviews.text: Soft, cute, and got the matching changing table sheets. Snug fit on a standard crib matteess
customer_reviews.author: Sara E

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love the patterns but they are a bit see through so you can see the mattress design through them.
customer_reviews.author: Corina_cmr

customer_reviews.title: Sheets are thicker than ones we have gotten before and ...
customer_reviews.text: Sheets are thicker than ones we have gotten before and fit really well, air mattress is about an inch thicker than a standard crib mattress and these wrapped around no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Keith R Clyde

customer_reviews.title: As expected!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fit my standard crib mattress perfectly! Love the unisex design. Good for my first daughter and can reuse for any future sons!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Airaghi

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: Extremely thin, you can see right through it. The mattress has a print on it thats visible even with the sheets on it. Unfortunately I accidently threw the packaging away in order to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge rivera

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sheets! Loved them for our toddlers and our babies rooms! Can't wait to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Thewifenextdoor

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing crib sheets and company
customer_reviews.text: This is such a truly amazing company they even took the time to email me to make sure I got them and ask about there product!!! the crib sheets are so soft and easy to put on my daughter absolutely loves them and there so beautiful!!! I wish I could give them more stars will definitely be getting more products from them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmi

customer_reviews.title: Fits regular size toddler mattress perfect, cute and effective
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. Fits regular size toddler mattress perfect, cute and effective
customer_reviews.author: aaron rey

customer_reviews.title: So soft!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets for baby-- super soft and look just like the pictures. I wish I had these sheets on my bed!
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn Brocato

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sheets so soft and they don’t get lent balls when you wash them often
customer_reviews.author: junior

customer_reviews.title: ... were given as a baby shower gift and were perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These crib sheets were given as a baby shower gift and were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work well. Wish they’d do packs of just the cloud print.
customer_reviews.author: Meesh

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: These crib sheets really are as soft and they fit perfectly on the crib mattress I bought. They are tight and have no slack which is great. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Adelene Foo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful soft sheets
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful soft sheets! The Jersey cotton makes it feel like a t-shirt. Fits my standard size crib with a 5" mattress well.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for doggie back seat covers on our 2 cars, could be thicker though.
customer_reviews.author: SCR

customer_reviews.title: Good basic sheets for a standard crib mattress
customer_reviews.text: Soft and pretty, easy to pull over a standard crib mattress. Fit snugly with no creases, good for baby safety. We love these sheets so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anuk

customer_reviews.title: For some reason they smelled like diesel exhaust
customer_reviews.text: For some reason they smelled like diesel exhaust. I've washed them like 5 times and still their. Not sure if product or shipping.
customer_reviews.author: chancey

customer_reviews.title: Good sheets
customer_reviews.text: Nice sheets but a little to loose for my liking. Also the grey is not that grey.
customer_reviews.author: Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. So soft and cute and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: E C

customer_reviews.title: ... them for a while now and they still look like new. Great quality and super cute
customer_reviews.text: I have them for a while now and they still look like new. Great quality and super cute. I would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are so soft I absolutely love them, can’t wait for my baby girl to sleep on them
customer_reviews.author: Iamtoast

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and nice design BUT the sheets have a very strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and nice design BUT the sheets have a very strong smell! I have washed it, but it still smells. I hope a few more washes will get rid of the scent! Kind of a burn rubber sort of smell...
customer_reviews.author: Batya

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets
customer_reviews.text: Soft and fit nicely over the crib mattress, would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Linzh7

customer_reviews.title: Cloud crib sheets
customer_reviews.text: They are for my Grand-daughters baby shower. She registered with Amazon. I am pleased with the product and I know she will also.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lewis the Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were a baby shower gift for my daughter and she likes him very well
customer_reviews.author: Donna D

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: On crib now waiting for grandson to sleep on them. Seem very soft...
customer_reviews.author: Candy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits standard crib mattress perfectly. Not too tight or lose. Material is soft and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these sheets they are soft
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets they are soft, and I don't have to struggle to fit them on my crib mattress like the previous sheets I bought. I love the gray becuase it matches everything and is unisex
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheets for baby
customer_reviews.text: So soft and LO loves them. Deep sides fit well over a mattress, pad, and bumpers.
customer_reviews.author: autumn

customer_reviews.title: and I'm totally satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: They are soft and lovely, and I'm totally satisfied with my purchase. I can't wait to lay my daughter down on these beautiful sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Uzenski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful quality sheets. Did not loose shape when washed and fit crib mattress perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Color is slightly darker than the picture but ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Color is slightly darker than the picture but they are still very cute and so so soft we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and softness of these sheets. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really soft but got a hole after the second wash
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Soft
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find out they were soft like they said fresh out the pack. I still washed them in baking soda and vinegar and still comfy soft. I got these for myand it fits perfect, even after a wash and dry in hot water and high heat. I think they're stinking adorable and my son doesn't seem to mind them ;] Will change to 5 stars based on their wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz

customer_reviews.title: Smells like petroleum
customer_reviews.text: I washed these sheets per the instructions along with some of my son's clothes using All free and clear detergent. The sheets smelled fine out of the package. After washing, the sheets smelled like petroleum along with the clothes! I tried washing in warm water with a different detergent and the smell was worse! I am now washing the clothes repeatedly trying to salvage them. Whatever chemical is in these sheets I am not about to have my son's skin in contact with it.
customer_reviews.author: ConscientiousMomma16

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets . Normally most sheets are rough after using the baby detergent and dryer sheets after a few washes . I have about 5-6 of them and think they are so subtle with the design .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better ones out there...
customer_reviews.text: The colors are very dull and doesnt look like new.
customer_reviews.author: FirstTimeMom

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Liked the way they fit around the mattress. They are easy to put on, stretch nicely, and are soft for my baby. Loved the patterns too.
customer_reviews.author: mrsstrange

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sheets.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these sheets for my babies! I wish I could find jersey sheets that feel this good for my own bed. I also wish I could buy more, but they’re a bit expensive (at least for me). My babies sleep on very firm mattresses and I feel this helps with the comfort for them. I would say altogether this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it 😍🤗
customer_reviews.text: The baby sheet is so cute, super solf. Very good quality. Thank you! For making affordable 100% cotton baby sheet, I wish the company had it in king size bed lol will love to buy it. Very happy with my purchased! 😍🤗
customer_reviews.author: W.R

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets! They don't just slip right off the mattress like my old ones did!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sheets
customer_reviews.text: Quality sheets! The best I've bought so far. My daughter likes to take her sheets off but these wrap around the bottom well so she can't remove them. Extremely soft too. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: nickie

customer_reviews.title: Buy these.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sheets for my son's bed. They don't get hard and stiff in the wash. Wish I had found these years ago!
customer_reviews.author: DrewsCrows

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these sheets!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these sheets! They are so soft and fit perfectly. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits prfectly with the theme and colors of the nursery
customer_reviews.author: melstl

customer_reviews.title: Comfy sheets
customer_reviews.text: I received my pack and play sheets as expected. They are a great material. Soft and comfy as I had hoped. They fit perfectly too!!
customer_reviews.author: ItsKrisCruz

product_meta.title: Jomolly Crib Sheets, 2 Pack Unisex Clouds and Chevron Fitted Soft Jersey Cotton Bedding
feature_bullets: ❤ EXTRA SOFT 100% JERSEY COTTON SHEETS - Our crib sheets are made of 100% high quality soft jersey cotton. Perfect for your baby’s sensitive skin and so soft that you are going to want them in your own bed

❤ FITTED CRIB SHEET - Our generously sized crib sheet measures 28 x 52 x 9” and comes with an elastic band all around the sides to securely fit all standard crib mattresses. They are very easy to put in place even when you need to change sheets in the middle of the night. Perfect as a baby shower gift or for your own nursery

❤ STYLISH AND CUSTOM MADE - Our baby crib sheets come in a classic, gender neutral grey and white design of clouds and chevron that will put the finishing touches to any bedding. Make sure to give your darling a serene and calm bed to rest in

❤ DURABLE & MACHINE WASHABLE - Our sheets are durable and long lasting and can be machine washed as often as you need. They come in a set of 2 to make sure that you’ll always have an extra set when needed
❤ HAPPY CUSTOMERS - We Love our customers and we do whatever it takes to make them happy. If you are not happy, all you need to do is let us know and we will resolve the issue

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars178 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
